articles.title: FIELD NOTE: THE MAP IS NOT THE TERRITORY
articles.body: Most organizations confuse their organizational chart with their actual communication network. When we deploy the Trace protocol, we find the critical node is often a Scheduler in a basement office.

articles.title: FIELD NOTE: PRECISION VS ACCURACY
articles.body: In CNC, precision is repeatability. Accuracy is hitting the mark. You can be precise (hitting the same wrong spot every time) without being accurate. Strategy works the same way.

articles.title: FIELD NOTE: ENTROPY
articles.body: Chaos is the default state. Order requires energy injection. If you stop pushing, the system decays.
